Package com.prckt.krowemarf.components.Posts

Class Posts

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
      • java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
        • java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
          • com.prckt.krowemarf.components.Posts.Posts
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    _Component, _Posts, java.rmi.Remote

    public class Posts
extends java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
implements _Posts
    The post component is used to create deferred messages. Connected to the database to add, or suppress messages.
    See Also:
